Patent Information.Patent Title: Method for producing an antifungal peptide in a filamentous fungal host cell.
Patent Information.Abstract: The present invention provides a method for producing an antifungal peptide in a filamentous fungal host cell by expressing the antifungal peptide in a host cell which is deficient or partially deficient in the expression of an endogenous glucosyl-ceramide synthase (gcs) gene.
